data.title: Minnesota Public Radio
data.meta_description: Minnesota Public Radio is one of the nation's premier public radio organizations, operating a regional network of more than three dozen stations in Minnesota and its neighboring communities.
data.text:
MPR at the Minnesota State Fair

Like corn dogs and ketchup, chocolate chip cookies and cold milk, the Minnesota State Fair and Minnesota Public Radio are a match made in heaven. And this year, Camp MPR returns with even more excitement and adventure!

Find our booth near the corner of Judson and Nelson, Aug. 22 through Labor Day, Sept. 2, for the most Minnesota experience that ever dared Minnesota!

Find full programming and info on how to snag a limited-edition MPR tote designed by local Minnesota artist, Madison Holler of Rubinski Works at mpr.org/statefair.

Split Rock Lighthouse shines with new tours, Indigenous history exhibit

Minnesotaâ€™s iconic North Shore lighthouse has transformed itself over the last few years since the pandemic. A recent trip found a new walking tour and new detail on the history of the Native American people who were there long before the 114-year-old tower.
